    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_e9e65f5cb45947d37541af0523dc54b806121d56</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Calculating reflection angles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechenreflexion Winkel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Angles calculateurs de réflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ângulos calculadores da reflexão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Angoli calcolatori di riflessione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γωνίες αντανάκλασης υπολογισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ángulos calculadores de la reflexión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an incident light ray striking a mirror at different angles. This can be used as an exercise to calculate for the value of angle x.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einem Ereignis den hellen 
Strahl, der einen Spiegel in den unterschiedlichen Winkeln anschlägt.
Dieses kann als Übung verwendet werden, um für den Wert von 
Winkel x zu errechnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre à un incident le rayon
léger heurtant un miroir à différents angles. Ceci peut être
employé comme exercice pour calculer pour la valeur de l'angle X.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a um incident o raio 
claro que golpeia um espelho em ângulos diferentes. Isto pode 
ser usado como um exercício calcular para o valor do ângulo x.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra ad un avvenimento il 
raggio luminoso che colpisce uno specchio agli angoli differenti. 
Ciò può essere usata come esercitazione per calcolare per il 
valore dell'angolo x.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει συναφή ελαφριά ακτίνα 
που χτυπά έναν καθρέφτη στις διαφορετικές γωνίες. Αυτό 
μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση που υπολογίζει για την αξία 
της γωνίας Χ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a incidente el rayo 
ligero pulso un espejo a diversos ángulos. Esto se puede 
utilizar como ejercicio para calcular para el valor del ángulo x.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καθρέφτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión</string>
          </keyword>
